title: App Developers
smallDesc: Front end only Scroll Trigger Animation website
details:
1. This is A Front End Only Website
2. It is a responsive website.
3. It has Animation with GSAP or GreenSock Animation Plugin.

title: Samad's Edu Care
details:
1. This is a React based Single Page Application
2. It has react-router for why the website loads fast.
3. It has simple firebase Authentication.
4. In this website You can sign in with custom email, gmail and github.
5. It is a responsive website.

title: Luxurious Car
details:
1. This is A Dynamic Website.
2. It is a responsive website.
3. It has login facilities like Google, Github and custom email.
